comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henni_Forchhammer "Henriette "Henni" Forchhammer (1863 – 1955) was a Danish educator and women's rights activist."

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of January 16, 1916 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10711FB3E5F17738... lists her (mis-spelled as Henry) as a speaker at the final luncheon of the peace conference to which Henry Ford took U.S. delegates.

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I'm guessing that brooch she's wearing says "ICW,"  standing for "International Council of Women," of which she was vice-president at the time of the photo (according to that wiki page).
